DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Skin Irritation Photo Irritation JNJ 10229570-AAA Intact Skin Japanese Healthy Male Participants
DOC.detailed_description: This single center , interpreter-blinded ( person interpret result know name assign drug ) , randomize ( drug assign chance like flip coin ) , vehicle-controlled , closed-patch test study . Thirty ( 30 ) Japanese participant enrol study . Each treatment ( JNJ 10229570-AAA 1.2 % , 2.4 % , 3.6 % , vehicle cream formulation , petroleum jelly ) randomly apply vertical position back participant , corresponding strength apply vertical position ( left vs. right ) . The study drug apply left side wash 48 hour application . The dermatological evaluation photo shoot do 1 ( T49 ) 24 ( T72 ) hour wash drug . All participant complete dermatological evaluation include evaluation skin irritation skin photo irritation . The study drug apply right side wash 24 hour application . The dermatological evaluation photo shoot do 1 hour washing . Ultraviolet A ( UVA ) irradiate application site . One hour irradiation start ( T26 ) , dermatological evaluation photo shoot do . Afterwards application site cover protection UV . Twenty-four hour wash ( T48 ) , cover take , dermatological evaluation photo shoot do 1 ( T49 ) 24 ( T72 ) hour . Additionally , safety profile JNJ 10229570-AAA assess study . The study total duration maximum 32 day .
DOC.criteria: Signed informed consent document Body mass index 18.0 30.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) , body weight less 50 kg Blood pressure 90 140 mmHg systolic ( inclusive ) , high 90 mmHg diastolic Electrocardiogram ( ECG ) consistent normal cardiac conduction function Nonsmoker Agree use adequate contraception method History current clinically significant medical illness investigator considers exclude participant could interfere interpretation study result Clinically significant abnormal value hematology , biochemistry urinalysis Clinically significant abnormal physical examination , vital sign ECG Use prescription nonprescription medication ( include vitamin herbal supplement ) within 14 day study treatment History drug alcohol abuse within past 5 year Drug allergy drug hypersensitivity Blood donation , depend volume blood collection Positive test human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) , hepatitis B C , syphilis Dermatological disease application site Photosensitivity Exposure excessive chronic ultraviolet ( UV ) radiation ( i.e. , sunbathe , tan salon use , phototherapy ) within 4 week prior study treatment plan study period
